Home.benefit1: Give your things a second life
Home.benefit2: We help to find each other
Home.benefit3: Fast communication for exchange or sale

title.message: Title must be up to 60 characters

description.message: Description must be up to 300 characters

price.message1: Price must be a positive number
price.message2: Price must be a valid number

title.name: Title
title.description: The headline of your ad that users see in search or on the page. It should be short and clear.

description.name: Description
description.description: A short description of the ad. Explains what the ad is about and encourages the user to purchase or trade.

price.name: Price
price.description: Set a competitive price for your item (must be a positive number).

nickname.name: Nickname
nickname.description: The nickname that will be displayed on the site must be unique. The length must be more than 4 characters.

legalName.name: Legal name
legalName.description: Name indicated on the passport, driver’s license or other travel document. Will not be displayed on the site.

legalSurname.name: Legal surname
legalSurname.description: Surname as indicated on official documents such as a passport or ID. Will not be visible on the site.

gender.name: Gender
gender.description: Select your gender as indicated in your official documents. This information will be used for verification purposes.

dateOfBirth.name: Date of Birth
dateOfBirth.description: Enter your date of birth as stated in your passport or ID. Must be 18 years or older to register.

email.name: Email Address
email.description: A valid email address that will be used for login and notifications. Must be accessible to confirm your account.

phoneNumber.name: Phone number
phoneNumber.description: Primary contact number with country code. Will be used for verification and important account notifications.

extraPhoneNumber.name: Extra phone number
extraPhoneNumber.description: Optional additional contact number in case we can't reach you via your primary number.

informationFormInputs.infoNickname: Your nickname (Shown instead of Full Name)
informationFormInputs.documentNameDescr: Name indicated on the passport, driver’s license or other travel document.

languageRegion.name: Language and region
languageRegion.description: Select your preferred language and region. This will help personalize your experience on the site.

currency.name: Currency
currency.description: Choose the currency you want to use for prices and transactions. Options include USD, UAH, and EUR.

place.name: Place
place.description: Enter your place of residence. This information helps us display relevant offers in your area.

notifications.name: Notifications
notifications.description: Turn on or off notifications about important updates, messages, and offers.

showPhone.name: Show phone
showPhone.description: Enable or disable the display of your phone number in your public profile and listings.

advancedUser.name: Advanced user
advancedUser.description: Activate advanced user features such as extended analytics and profile customization.

deleteAccount.name: Delete account
deleteAccount.description: Select a reason for deleting your account. This helps us understand your experience and improve the platform.

settingFormInputs.deleteAccountOption1: I no longer use the service
settingFormInputs.deleteAccountOption5: I have security or privacy concerns
settingFormInputs.deleteAccountOption6: Too much spam or unnecessary messages
settingFormInputs.deleteAccountOption7: Temporarily deleting, planning to come back later
settingFormInputs.deleteAccountOption9: Can't find the functionality I need
settingFormInputs.deleteAccountOption11: I'm not happy with the company's policies

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.preTitle: Welcome to U2M Space — a platform designed to ensure safe and convenient exchange, sales, and participation in auctions.
privacyPolicy.description: We respect your right to privacy and transparency about how we handle your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains what information we collect, how we process it, and how you can manage your data. By using the U2M Space platform («Platform», «we», «U2M»), you agree to this Policy and give consent for data processing in accordance with applicable law.

generalProvisions.title: I. General Provisions
generalProvisions.description:
This Policy regulates the collection, storage, processing, and use of personal data of U2M Space users («users», «you», «U2M»). 

The Platform Administration (our team) processes your data when necessary for:

items.1: Access to shopping, auctions, and exchanges
items.3: Improving services and personalizing user experience

informationWeCollect.title: II. Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.description: We may receive the following personal data:

items.2: Address of the seller or buyer (in case of deals)
items.4: Cookies and session storage to analyze user behavior
items.5: Platform usage history (searches, product views, bids, exchanges, etc.)
items.6: Data from third-party analytics (Google, Facebook, etc.)
items.7: Demographics or other public data that can be found in open sources

howWeUseYourInformation.title: III. How We Use Your Information
howWeUseYourInformation.description: We use your personal data for the following purposes:

items.1: Creating and maintaining your user account
items.3: Display of personalized content, products, bids

dataSharingAndDisclosure.title: IV. Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharingAndDisclosure.description: We do not share your data with third parties, except:

items.1: When necessary to provide services (e.g., delivery, payment providers)
items.2: When required by law or court order
items.3: In case of rule violations to protect U2M Space and users’ rights

protectingYourInformation.title: V. Protecting Your Information
protectingYourInformation.description: We apply modern technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data. Your data is stored on secure servers. Only authorized employees with confidentiality agreements have access to it.

items.1: View, change, or delete your profile data
items.2: Request complete data deletion via our support
items.3: Withdraw consent, which may limit your access to services

policyUpdates.title: VII. Policy Updates
policyUpdates.description: We may update this Policy. If we do, you will be notified via the Platform. By continuing to use the service after updates, you agree to the new terms.

additionalTerms.title: VIII. Additional Terms
additionalTerms.description:
U2M Space is not responsible for account loss due to the user's unsafe behavior. 

 This Policy is subject to the U2M Space Terms of Use.

contactInformation.title: Contact Information
contactInformation.description: For questions or concerns about privacy, contact us at:

userDataDeletion.title: User Data Deletion
userDataDeletion.preTitle: We respect your right to privacy and provide the ability to delete your personal data upon request.

howToRequestDataDeletion.title: How to request data deletion:
howToRequestDataDeletion.description: To delete your account and all associated personal data, please follow these two steps:

items.1: 1. Log in to your profile, go to the «Settings» section, and click «Delete Account», selecting a reason for deletion. Your account will then be hidden from public view. Full and permanent data deletion will occur automatically after 6 months
items.2: 2. If you wish to speed up the process, send an email to delete@u2m.space with the subject «User Data Deletion».

whatWillBeDeleted.title: What will be deleted:
whatWillBeDeleted.description: After confirming your identity, we will:

items.2: Delete or anonymize all personal information associated with your profile
items.3: Stop further processing of your data

processingTime.title: Processing time:
processingTime.description: Deletion requests are processed within 30 calendar days from the date of receipt.
processingTime.info: If you have any additional questions regarding the deletion or processing of personal data — feel free to contact us at any time.

nickname.title: Nickname
nickname.description:
Only the user's nickname is displayed in all listings. 

 During the first login, the system prompts to set a unique nickname (4–16 characters). Without it, the user cannot proceed on the platform.

realName.title: Real Name
realName.description: First and last name are used only optionally for identity verification. After verification, these fields increase the «Trust Level» and uploaded documents are deleted from the system

trustLevel.title: Trust Level
trustLevel.description:
Shows how trustworthy the user is as a buyer or seller. 

 Scale: from 0 to 100 points.

 Starting value: 25 points. 

 The rating is updated automatically based on the user's actions (algorithm details coming soon).

bonuses.title: Bonuses (U)
bonuses.description:
Internal currency of the platform. 

 Accrued for quality listings. Bonuses can be used to boost ads in the feed.

emailAndPhone.title: Email and Phone
emailAndPhone.description: Can be imported from social networks. If not — fields will be highlighted as mandatory.

afterAuthorization.title: After Authorization
afterAuthorization.description:
If all required fields are filled — user is taken to the listing feed. 

 If some data is missing — the My Space / Profile page opens with instructions on what needs to be fixed.

languageRegionCurrencyLocation.title: Language & Region, Currency, Location
languageRegionCurrencyLocation.description: These settings are available via [ICON:globe:] icon in the top menu, and in My Space / Profile. They duplicate each other for convenience.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Separate button in the top menu [ICON:chat:]. It handles event alerts. Notifications are also sent by email.

experiencedUser.title: Experienced User
experiencedUser.description:
If disabled — interface shows hints, text menu, and icons. 

 If enabled — simplified interface: only icons, no text hints.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description:
This option deletes the user’s account. 

 For 6 months the data remains stored (with limited access), then it is permanently deleted. Next to it, a dropdown shows possible deletion reasons. If the account is blocked, it is not deleted for 1 year. Upon repeated violation, it is permanently banned without recovery.

hiddenDataAfterVerification.title: Hidden Data After Verification
hiddenDataAfterVerification.description: After identity verification, fields like Real Name, Last Name, Gender, Date of Birth become hidden and inaccessible for editing or viewing by others.

moderationGoal.title: Moderation Goal
moderationGoal.description: Ensure that all ads on the platform are relevant, safe, comply with site rules, and do not violate any country's laws.

description.title: Title — short, clear, without excessive symbols (!!!, $$$) or emojis (🔥, TOP, super deal)
description.description: Description — informative, no offensive language, spam, or contact info (if prohibited).

items.1: Genuine, not taken from the internet (check via image search)

categoryTags.title: 2. Category & Tags
categoryTags.description:
Correct product/service category selected. 

 Relevant tags that reflect the ad's content

postingRules.title: 3. Posting Rules
postingRules.description: Ads are not allowed if they:

items.1: Violate laws (weapons, drugs, pirated software, animals without permits, etc.)
items.4: Are duplicates (same ad in multiple categories or accounts)
items.5: Are purely promotional, not part of P2P trading

moderatorWorkflow.title: Moderator Workflow
moderatorWorkflow.description:
Receive list of new/updated ads. 

 Open each ad and check:

items.2: Return for revision — comment on what needs to be fixed
items.3: Reject — specify a clear reason for rejection (from template or custom)

items.1: Photo doesn’t match the product or is taken from someone else
items.2: Ad contains prohibited topic (e.g. document sales)
items.3: Description includes contact info, which is against the rules
items.4: Ad is a duplicate of an already published one

items.1: Confidentiality: do not disclose any user personal data.
items.2: Impartiality: only approve/reject based on rules, not personal opinion.
items.3: Logging: all moderator actions must be saved (for history/audit).

Metadata.title: Marketplace for Trading, Selling & Auctions of Items
Metadata.description: A universal marketplace to sell, trade or auction new and used items. Safe, easy and profitable — join now and start exchanging!
